thread.section_title: Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: This is a really nice hotel at good price
thread.title_full: This is a really nice hotel at good price - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Hersom
title: This is a really nice hotel at good price
text: The location is great for tourism and fine for business - my business involved meetings across Paris. The streets are safe and the welcome felt genuine. I liked the room and it was comfortable. And it was quiet despite my room being on the street.
